tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ** **** *** ** *** ******* My wife went into labour before 33 weeks of gestation and that too in wee hours of the night. Dr Varsha not only rushed to the clinic (as she lives within the same apartment complex), she ensured both the twins were delivered safely. During pregnancy, she used to patiently answer all queries my wife had, either in person or through WhatsApp. In fact, my wife and I had covid when she was in second trimester. Doctor Varsha has saved my wife, our twins. She is really great.
reply_text: Dear Prana thank you for the heartwarming comments. Some patients are ideal. They believe in their doctors and God helps us to achieve the best for them üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: A great experience! The most important thing that we as patients expect from a doctor is understanding the concern and giving time. Dr Varsha is one such doc who not only listens patiently but also gives time and helps the person understand the root cause of the problem. Have visited several docs across Delhi, Gurgaon, Mumbai but i was never satisfied with any doctor due to lack of time given/ treatment done. However, Its been almost 6 months and I'am completely satisfied and happy with her behavior & treatment.
reply_text: Thanks krati, you will be fine soon

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted  Dr varsha for acute pain in lower abdomen.I had an ultrasound which mentioned ovarian torsion.She didnt listen to my symptoms at all.She didnt even take my vitals ******  ******* ** *** ******* * **** ********* **** ** **** ** ***** ********* ***** *** juat asked me to get laroscopic surgery done as soon as possible..After takeing second opion *** ******* ****** ********* ****** **** ** **** **** ** *** *** *********** *** ******* ** ************* ***** ** *dont recomment **** ********* *******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife was 6 months pregnant but the baby was not alive from 5th month. We visited her 2 times between 5th and 6th month and my wife was keep on telling she can't feel the movement but insted of checking the heart beat of the baby she just simply did the routine checkup. Later i came to know that every doctor starts to check the heart beat of the baby from 4th month. But she is just to casual and over confident and keep on teeling that your wife is over weight that is the reason but I have consulted 3 doctors and all of them said baby movement has nothing to do with abdominal thickness. ** *** ***** ***** *** **** *** *** ***** **** *** ***** **** ****** ***** ** ******* ** *********** By GOD grace my wife is fine. It could have effected her badly. If you still choose her i request you to have second opinion from another doctor as well in parallel. ****** ***** ***** *** ******** From my experience I will not recommended her to anyone. *** ** *** ***** ** ****
reply_text:
Firstly I am truly sorry for the loss.
2nd trimester fetal demise is a very unfortunate incident .While your anguish is understandable,this sad event is neither caused nor controlled by external factors.
Feeling fetal movements is subjective it varies from 18 to 25 weeks.
As per protocol the anomaly scan was done at18/19 weeks and the next scheduled between 24/26 weeks.
